lyrics:
Yeah
Hey, hey, hey
Word
Uh, uh
European size, that's a 42

Left from the scene being cordial

European bitch paying more than you

Young nigga hot, that's scorching

Walk in the store, that's a shoe sale

And all my bitches get Chanel

Drop the top and they eyes super glued

Fuck the check up, that's how we do



MILFs fucking with me like I'm 42

Baby ass soft, that's gucci goo

In the new lou, skip to my lou

Whipping up checks like tofu

Gone, but I'm back in a few

Plush carpet, got no shoes

In a one-seater with no room

Do a donut, then swoop

Drop a nigga cash like, "oops"

Smoking on loud, go mute

Eating my meals like stew

Making that bitch look cute

Picking these cars like fruit

Picking these girls like fruit

Super sweet for a spa day, and I wan' fuck a masseuse

Me and my juvies, divvy it up with the juvies

The money a discus, just by the way that I threw it

VVS movin'

Sir, you better cool it

Engine is vroomin'

In other words, bitch I'm zoomin'



European size, that's a 42

Left from the scene being cordial

European bitch paying more than you

Young nigga hot, that's scorching

Walk in the store, that's a shoe sale

And all my bitches get Chanel

Drop the top and they eyes super glued

Fuck the check up, that's how we do



European size bitch, 42

European move in a Bentley Coupe

And I'm gettin' head like shampoo

Cop some ice, you can brag too

My cash do the same thing the grass do

If her ass got bounce, it's a natural

Valentino boots, had to snag 'em

I be throwin' bands like a tantrum

Nigga so goofy, I'm laughin'

Might buy that watch with my back end

Leave out the mall with baggage

Foreign car, stoppin' up traffic

Ayy, I ain't cappin'

Shoes with the hoes, that was back then

Rollin' big blunts, not passin'

Gotta keep a slut for the action

And I can't let them squares in my circle

Private plane and I don't do commercial

All my niggas gon' get it, no turtles

Having kids with the money, I'm fertile

Roll me up a backwood of that purple

Got them Gucci shades on like I'm Urkel

Got the European drip like I'm Virgil



European size, that's a 42

Left from the scene being cordial

European bitch paying more than you

Young nigga hot, that's scorching

Walk in the store, that's a shoe sale

And all my bitches get Chanel

Drop the top and they eyes super glued

Fuck the check up, that's how we do



In the front seat, giving more juice

Send me that rum, not Grey Goose

Nigga, y'all lookin' like sore losers

It's a straight shot, oops, I mean straight shooter

I chief and I cough up a gasbag

Throw cash, I don't care where it land at

Louis V lookin' like grab bag

My pockets really stuffed, like jam packed

I go continent to continent

Got a bitch in every continent

I'mma buy the whole store, call it shop lift

Telemundo, they watchin' it

Supa' G's for the lottery

It's increasing our bottom end

Yea the boss niggas coppin' it

Care less if it cost a bit

Lemme Tokyo Drift

Lemme six-gear shift

Bought my bitch a new Range Rover, and a big box of chocolate

Go pack up that old lifestyle

Baby, my life's too wild

Fuckin that bitch for a while

Diamonds they hit like wow



European size, that's a 42

Left from the scene being cordial

European bitch paying more than you

Young nigga hot, that's scorching

Walk in the store, that's a shoe sale

And all my bitches get Chanel

Drop the top and they eyes super glued

Fuck the check up, that's how we do



That's how we do

That's how we do

European size, that's a 42

European size, that's a 42
